reg_info.act_under: Motor Vehicle Accident Claims Act   Loi sur l’indemnisation des victimes d’accidents de véhicules automobiles

content.content: 1. The following are named as designated insurers for the purposes of the Act: 1. Pitts Insurance Company. 2. Cardinal Insurance Company. 3. Northumberland General Insurance Company — Northumberland, compagnie générale d’assurances. 4. United Canada Insurance Company — Canada uni compagnie d’assurance. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 799, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following are named as designated insurers for the purposes of the Act:

1. Pitts Insurance Company.

2. Cardinal Insurance Company.

3. Northumberland General Insurance Company — Northumberland, compagnie générale d’assurances.

4. United Canada Insurance Company — Canada uni compagnie d’assurance. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 799, s. 1.
